boost::logging::optimize

boost::logging::optimize Namespace Reference

Gathering the message: contains optimizers for formatting and/or destinations: for example, caching techniques. More...


Classes

 This holds 3 strings - one for prepend, one for modification, and one for appending. More...

Detailed Description

Gathering the message: contains optimizers for formatting and/or destinations: for example, caching techniques.
